subject: French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: A year ago, in the French Open, Svetlana Kuznetsova came within one point of keeping Justine Henin-Hardenne from winning the trophy.  This year, they will play for the title.
snippet: A year ago, in the French Open, Svetlana Kuznetsova came within one point of keeping Justine Henin-Hardenne from winning the trophy.  This year, they will play for the title.
